mapper.select: select oi.id, oi.createtime, oi.flag, oi.customer, (select sum(orderlist.num * p.price ) from orderlist join products p on orderlist.productid = p.id where orderlist.orderid = oi.id ) as price from orderinfo oi where oi.id = #{id};
